t:
“Kill him and take his son to our base,” the enemy leader commanded.



As a soldier pointed his gun towards me, I smiled, knowing that they'll never suspect a child carrying a time bomb.
c:
A little sacrifice for greater good.



#enemy #kill #soldier #revenge #child #bomb #fear #happiness





Because, everyone's a smartass on depression now and talking about SSR; but no one, including YourQuote Baba, seems to pay any attention to the 20 soldiers killed in Ladakh. Because, soldiers – they die everyday; but no one apparently has killed themselves because of depression ever. We're the patriots of Independence Day banning ‘china apps’ with our ‘china mobile’.
See me, even I do these for 'likes'.
